c3a877d5-c1dc-431e-a14e-9925fa4a8929.description: A CILEX Fellow has successfully completed the academic stage of training, and the regulatory requirements. A legal professional and authorised person, they share their expertise to ensure effective running of client cases. They focus on continuous professional development and professional standards, demonstrating their commitment to uphold the CILEX Code of Conduct. They are entitled to use the postnominals FCILEX. This is not a practising certificate.
c3a877d5-c1dc-431e-a14e-9925fa4a8929.name: 2023 CILEX Member: Fellow

5424a8c5-64a9-4981-ada9-c3d105ad2708.description: Earners have achieved the CILEX Level 3 Professional Diploma in Law and Practice which is a broad-based, practical introduction to Law and Legal Practice: addressing the key areas of Law and Legal Practice including Contract Law, Criminal Law, Land Law and Law of Tort as well as demonstrating the professional practical skills of legal research and client care.

alignments.name: Ofqual
alignments.description: Qualifications are regulated in England (Ofqual), Qualifications in Wales (Wales) and CCEA (Northern Ireland).

badge_template_activities.title: This qualification consists of 10 units in total which have been assessed by CILEX including demonstration of the key transferable legal skills of legal research and client care in practical situations. The CILEX Professional Diploma in Law and Practice understanding and skills at Level 3 of the Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF). The qualification has been designed to be comparable in level of difficulty to GCE A Levels and NVQs at Level 3.

skills.name: CILEX Level 3 Diploma in Law and Practice

c7e68971-77ce-495a-96c8-dedfd34fdd02.description: Earners have achieved the CILEX Level 6 Diploma in Law and Practice, specialising in a Legal Practice area, whilst at the same time demonstrating knowledge and understanding of an underpinning series of Law subjects and Legal Skills. The qualification aims to create the complete Chartered Legal Executive, both academically competent in respect of their chosen legal area, and also suitably professional to be easily employable in a fast-evolving legal workplace.

25850f3f-d014-43a6-aace-a2000c2217da.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Foundation Stage Ethics and Professional Responsibility – an Introduction module which ensures an understanding of legal professional and regulatory responsibility. badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will have explored introductory aspects of compliance, including money laundering, data protection and client due diligence which are essential to a practicing paralegal or lawyer.

21ca9315-63cf-4a20-89b7-15d6624f7eae.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Foundation Stage Legal Systems module which covers the fundamental knowledge and understanding of key elements of the English legal system and the constitution, including the distinction between civil and criminal law and between common law and equity, as well as the hierarchy of the courts. There is a focus on the creation of law, legislative and executive powers as well as the power of the judiciary.
21ca9315-63cf-4a20-89b7-15d6624f7eae.name: CILEX CPQ Foundation Stage Legal Systems

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those competing the module will be able to assess the appropriate track for a civil case and decide the appropriate court of first instance for a criminal matter. They will demonstrate practical knowledge of the most appropriate method of ADR based on circumstances, be able to identify whether a case has merit to warrant application for judicial review and analyse whether a particular characteristic is protected under the Equality Act 2010.

9ba762da-8c2b-4a58-b92d-b0ca08f58434.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Foundation Stage Law of Tort module which covers the fundamental knowledge and understanding of the law of tort, the operational contexts and the affected relationships. It explores how rights and interests are protected by statute and common law; how and when duties and obligations arise; how a breach of a statutory or common law duty may give rise to a cause of action; what full and partial defences might be available to challenge a claim and potential remedies.
9ba762da-8c2b-4a58-b92d-b0ca08f58434.name: CILEX CPQ Foundation Stage The Law of Tort

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will be to evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of a client’s position, be able to offer recommendations and advise in the client’s best interests.

ab47f64c-4ccb-49b6-8ab4-09f497111a9b.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Foundation Stage Contract Law module which covers the essential knowledge and understanding of the law of contract, the contexts in which it operates and how it may underpin commercial, professional, and individual relationships. fbcb0872-8f53-4117-995f-321ce4dad8f8.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Foundation Stage Introduction to Property and Private Client module which covers the knowledge and understanding of the law and procedure relating to conveyancing and probate. There is a focus on the procedures required to act on a sale and purchase in a freehold residential conveyancing transaction. The module explores the purpose and content of a Will, the Intestacy Rules, and how to apply for a Grant of Probate and the appointment of Personal Representatives.

ed56b712-68f5-4a44-b9f9-1c325f77ec34.description: Earners have achieved the CILEX Level 3 Certificate in Law and Practice which is a broad-based, practical introduction to Law and Legal Practice with an endorsement in the Legal Practice area of Child Care Practice. The earner has completed units in an introduction to law and practice, the Practice of Childcare Law and Family Law as well as demonstrating the professional practical skills of legal research and client care.
ed56b712-68f5-4a44-b9f9-1c325f77ec34.name: CILEX Level 3 Certificate in Law and Practice (Child Care Practice)

alignments.name: Ofqual
alignments.description: Qualifications are regulated in England (Ofqual), Qualifications in Wales (Wales) and CCEA (Northern Ireland).

badge_template_activities.title: This qualification consists of 5 units in total which have been assessed by CILEX including demonstration of the key transferable legal skills of legal research and client care in practical situations. The CILEX Certificate in Law and Practice was designed to assess knowledge, understanding and skills at Level 3 of the Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF). The qualification has been designed to be comparable in level of difficulty to GCE A Levels and NVQs at Level 3.

skills.name: CILEX Level 3 Certificate in Law & Practice

5959886d-e412-4cc4-b3cd-c20574bcfd78.description: Earners have achieved the CILEX Level 3 Certificate in Law and Practice which is a broad-based, practical introduction to Law and Legal Practice with an endorsement in the Legal Practice area of Elderly Client Practice. The earner has completed units in an introduction to law and practice, the Practice of Law for the Elderly Client and the Law of Wills and Succession as well as demonstrating the professional practical skills of legal research and client care.
5959886d-e412-4cc4-b3cd-c20574bcfd78.name: CILEX Level 3 Certificate in Law and Practice (Elderly Client Practice)

f482d5c6-7af5-4545-8eae-c37297f275c7.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Criminal Law and Litigation module which covers the essential knowledge and understanding of criminal law and its end-to-end process; how in practice a case commences; its progress through the Criminal Justice System to conclusion. The module explores the principles of criminal liability, key criminal offences and defences including theft, criminal damage, murder and knife crime. On completion, procedures to conduct a criminal case will be followed.
f482d5c6-7af5-4545-8eae-c37297f275c7.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Criminal Law and Litigation

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will know the sequence of its procedures to provide support, care and conduct through the life of a criminal case.

64517c1e-af47-432b-bd68-6095861a6c70.description: This individual is an Associate Prosecutor and member of CILEX, the professional association and governing body for Chartered Legal Executive Lawyers. For those who are working for the CPS as acting as an Associate Prosecutor. In order to practise as an Associate Prosecutor, you will also be required to obtain an annual practising certificate.
64517c1e-af47-432b-bd68-6095861a6c70.name: 2022 CILEX Member: Associate Prosecutor

1dcb80f2-93f9-4e70-91d9-9da1fab366bf.description: The earner has been appointed by the CILEX Board to be a CILEX Companion. This is awarded annually to outstanding or distinguished Fellows who have contributed to the advancement of the legal profession and to the recognition of CILEX Lawyers. CILEX Companion is the highest award given to any CILEX member.
1dcb80f2-93f9-4e70-91d9-9da1fab366bf.name: 2022 CILEX Member: Companion

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: This is limited to those appointed by the CILEX Board to be CILEX Companions, and recognises exceptional CILEX practitioners with a proven track record in their own organisations or in their contribution to CILEX.

5508097c-9bc1-4bf9-9fdc-dcfee4b8d341.description: Completed exams & professional experience to become a CILEX Advanced Paralegal operating with a degree of autonomy. Owning straightforward cases works with clients to identify a range of considerations, drawing appropriate conclusions and presenting recommendations in the client’s best interest; using logical argument, drafting and preparing information for clients. Keeps up to date with changes in the law, practice and the use of technology. Combines commercial awareness and legal expertise.
5508097c-9bc1-4bf9-9fdc-dcfee4b8d341.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: CPQ Advanced Stage is awarded on completion of mandatory and optional legal pathway modules and exams, covering law and application to practice, Ethics and Professional Responsibility and achieving Professional Experience criteria.

skills.name: Professional and Legal Skills: Legal Research
Professional and Legal Skills: Succeeding in the Legal Environment

8f12566a-7f22-4461-b194-9a14cf586f33.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Business and Employment Law module which covers the knowledge and understanding of common business structures, including how they are formed and operate within relevant legal frameworks, awareness of associated internal procedures, liability issues for owners and managers and how such businesses may come to an end through insolvency. In addition, a basic understanding of the key issues on employer/employee relationships and taxation will be covered.
8f12566a-7f22-4461-b194-9a14cf586f33.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Business and Employment Law

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will be able to identify and advise upon the most appropriate form of business structure for a client, explain to a client how to set up their chosen form of business structure including advantages and disadvantages. They will understand the liability arising from the main forms of business ownership and how to bring a business entity to an end and be able to draft the key documents relating to company procedures.

47149b33-ced6-4090-a4c7-1643efac0436.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Dispute Resolution and Litigation module which covers the knowledge and understanding of how disputes are resolved through the litigation process or through alternative dispute resolution methods.. On completion, an understanding of how costs underpin the litigation process and knowledge of how to conduct the case accordingly will have been achieved.
47149b33-ced6-4090-a4c7-1643efac0436.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Dispute Resolution and Litigation

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will know all stages of a case, from first considerations in dispute resolution through to enforcement of judgments following a trial. They will understand alternative methods of dispute resolution, taking into account the client’s wishes, together with the steps that can be taken to protect the client’s costs position. Those completing the module will also have an understanding of how costs underpin the litigation process and be able to conduct the case.

9cbce41f-4c52-4768-9b48-6e234135087f.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Ethics and Professional Responsibility. In context learning which includes modules on Ethical Conduct, Regulation, and Professional Practice as well as having explored regulation in the legal sector and the interplay between ethical regulation, professional regulation and legal regulation.
9cbce41f-4c52-4768-9b48-6e234135087f.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Ethics & Professional Responsibility – In Context

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module assessment will have used the knowledge gained to decide the most appropriate responses for two case studies, demonstrating the qualities exemplified by CILEX Lawyers.

8e331795-8234-456e-91c2-3915604a478d.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Family Law and Practice module which covers the essential knowledge and understanding of law and procedure to work on family law cases. The module explores a range of current family law topics that are encountered in practice, incorporating the formation of adult relationships, matters relating to children, and the breakdown of adult relationships.
8e331795-8234-456e-91c2-3915604a478d.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Family Law and Practice

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will have the skills to advise on procedural matters, draft basic court documentation including application for a matrimonial order and application for a private law children order.

0c44f521-fa01-439c-a81a-f57800efe4cf.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Professional and Legal Skills: Legal Research module. Those completing the module will be able to effectively use research tools for any legal purpose, whether that be contentious or non-contentious in nature and to use the information found in a constructive way to provide legal advice.
0c44f521-fa01-439c-a81a-f57800efe4cf.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Professional and Legal Skills: Legal Research

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will have developed the skills to conduct independent research based on a client scenario and prepare a report/appropriate advice for the client.

60e1bb7b-9b9b-4361-a78e-5a602ceff11f.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Professional and Legal Skills: Succeeding in the Legal Environment module which covers the essential professional and legal skills of working in a team including communication skills, commercial awareness and the impact of technology on legal practice.
60e1bb7b-9b9b-4361-a78e-5a602ceff11f.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Professional and Legal Skills: Succeeding in the Legal Environment

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will have developed the skills to increase both individual and team productivity and efficiency, have a greater commercial awareness including legal and business finance and will have developed an appreciation for the importance of continuous learning.

bc73475a-5edb-4496-a11b-aa1e167fd4d7.description: The earner has completed CPQ Advanced Stage Professional Experience, including the activities, skills and behaviours as set out in the CILEX Competency Framework. These include being able to conduct and apply legal research, draft legal documentation, developing well written supporting evidence to support a client case and understanding the economics of services being offered.
bc73475a-5edb-4496-a11b-aa1e167fd4d7.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Professional Experience

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has completed a portfolio of evidence to demonstrate their competence in activities, skills and behaviours as set out in the CILEX Competency Framework. These have been evidenced and verified by an employer.

e86b8cc5-e573-46c5-ab4f-ebf735c67f82.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Property and Conveyancing module which covers knowledge and understanding of the underlying law relating to conveyancing and how the law relates to practice. There is a focus on the creation of third-party rights in registered and unregistered land and how these issues might affect a buyer of land. It explores the grant and assignment of a long residential lease and the conveyancing procedures involved in those transactions.
e86b8cc5-e573-46c5-ab4f-ebf735c67f82.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Property and Conveyancing

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will know the main third-party rights encountered in conveyancing, how they are created and enforced; the procedures required to carry out a conveyancing transaction involving the sale/purchase of unregistered land, and the steps required to procure registration of the title at HM Land Registry; the procedures required to carry out, a transfer of part of a registered title; and, the procedures required to carry out a residential leasehold conveyancing transaction.

fb31d1b8-3455-4cf5-9c60-cb435469814a.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Advanced Stage Wills, Probate and Private Client module which covers the essential knowledge and understanding of the law relating to trusts together with the law and procedure relating to the drafting and construction of Wills and intestacy. Those completing the module will be able to draft a basic Will and codicil, as well as recognise risks and appropriate mitigations.
fb31d1b8-3455-4cf5-9c60-cb435469814a.name: CILEX CPQ Advanced Stage Wills, Probate and Private Client

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will be able to draft a basic Will and codicil, as well as recognise risks and consider appropriate steps to mitigate them.

cd87eeb6-4240-400e-b43b-0005669ec876.description: The earner has completed CPQ Foundation Stage Professional Experience, including the activities, skills and behaviours as set out in the CILEX Competency Framework and has been verified as competent by their workplace supervisor.
cd87eeb6-4240-400e-b43b-0005669ec876.name: CILEX CPQ Foundation Stage Professional Experience

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has completed a portfolio of evidence to demonstrate their competence in activities, skills and behaviours as set out in the CILEX Competency Framework. These have been evidenced and verified by an employer.

20eebd73-6bf2-40b5-bbf6-5561833c7d23.description: Earners have achieved the CPQ Professional Stage Dispute Resolution module which covers the essential knowledge and understanding required to deal with dispute resolution in a civil litigation context; give advice in the client's best interests, prepare a client's case and take steps to resolve the case. The module supports the development of advocacy skills to present cogent and clear arguments.
20eebd73-6bf2-40b5-bbf6-5561833c7d23.name: CILEX CPQ Professional Stage Dispute Resolution

issuer.summary: issued by CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

entity.name: CILEX (The Chartered Institute of Legal Executives)

badge_template_activities.title: Those completing the module will be able to challenge appropriately and give advice in the client's best interests. Through the development of drafting and tactical awareness skills, they will be able to prepare a client's case and take steps to resolve the case.
